subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Coach Eric Mangini likes to look beneath the surface, beyond the statistics, to appreciate — and defend — his players. On Thursday, it was linebacker Jonathan Vilma who received a verbal pat on the back.
snippet: Coach Eric Mangini likes to look beneath the surface, beyond the statistics, to appreciate — and defend — his players. On Thursday, it was linebacker Jonathan Vilma who received a verbal pat on the back.
